solution_line_template: She bought {num_pies} pies that had {slices_per_pie} slices each for a total of {num_pies}*{slices_per_pie} = <<{num_pies}*{slices_per_pie}={total_slices}>>{total_slices} slices

Rebecca ate {slices_eaten_by_rebecca_initial} of the {total_slices} slices leaving {total_slices}-{slices_eaten_by_rebecca_initial} =<<{total_slices}-{slices_eaten_by_rebecca_initial}={slices_after_rebecca}>>{slices_after_rebecca} slices

Her family and friends at {percent_eaten_by_family*100}% of the pie so they ate {slices_after_rebecca}*{percent_eaten_by_family} = <<{slices_after_rebecca}*{percent_eaten_by_family}={slices_eaten_by_family}>>{slices_eaten_by_family} slices

There were {slices_after_rebecca} slices and her family and friends ate {slices_eaten_by_family} slices so that leaves {slices_after_rebecca}-{slices_eaten_by_family} = <<{slices_after_rebecca}-{slices_eaten_by_family}={slices_after_family}>>{slices_after_family} slices

Sunday night Rebecca and her husband each had a slice from the remaining slices so that leaves {slices_after_family}-{slices_eaten_sunday} = <<{slices_after_family}-{slices_eaten_sunday}={slices_remaining}>>{slices_remaining} slices
